title: Image Overrides for Wayward
description: A file containing images/textures to override, and the paths in this mod of the images which override them.

replace.description: The base game image to replace. Examples: `doodad/mapletree`, `creature/bogling`

animated.description: Whether the new image is animated. (Uses a different frame every tick)

imagePath.description: The path to the replacement image. The `.png` file extension is not required. If this property is not provided, the replacement will use the path: `static/image/${replace}.png`
